segments.text: I notice the woman so absorbed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's tied neatly, and she's humming a little tune, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink behind her is overflowing terribly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the floor, and she has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me worry about the damage it'll cause later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on the stool, stretching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, but that stool is tilting back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it'll be heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, eyes full of hope for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just innocent kids enjoying a moment of fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is so serene, like nothing bad could happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mom would turn around and see all this.
segments.speaker: PAR
